hangle: 이 녀석, 남자 주인공인 시그렌 아냐?!
first_translate: isn’t this guy siegren, the male lead?!
the story doesn’t start for another six years...

hangle: 왜 남주가 벌써 내 코앞에서 굴러다니고 있는 거지?
first_translate: then why is he already here right before my eyes?

hangle: 얘가 이 시기에 아벨을 만나는 거던가?
first_translate: does that mean he’s going to meet abel soon?

hangle: 아니, 지금 이런 생각 할 때가 아니지!
first_translate: no... now isn’t the time to think about things like that!

hangle: 이 녀석이 이 세계를 구원할 남주가 맞다면
first_translate: if this kid really is the hero destined to save the world,
I’ll cause its destruction if I let him die after saving me!
everything will fall apart because of me!

hangle: 여, 여기 빨리 의원 좀 불러 주세요!
first_translate: p-please call for a doctor immediately!
two days later
hmm...
it was quite serious,
but fortunately, you’re out of danger now.
really? thank goodness!
let us know if anything happens.
okay! thanks so much!
that's good news!
now we’ve avoided doomsday!
still, looking at him from up close makes it hard to believe...

hangle: 세계를 구할 영웅이라며 칭송받을 거라곤 안 믿기네.
first_translate: ...that he'll become known as the hero who saves the world one day.

hangle: 이 시기면 시그렌 나이가 열네 살쯤인가…?
first_translate: siegren must be around fourteen or fifteen by now...

hangle: 나도 간단하게 몇 줄 설정만 했을 뿐,
first_translate: all I did was write down his backstory briefly,

hangle: 본편에서 세세하게 다룬 적은 없는 시그렌의 과거.
first_translate: as there wasn’t any detailed description of his past life in the original novel.

hangle: 시그렌은 남자 주인공답게 출생의 비밀을 가지고 있다.
first_translate: and just like all other protagonists, siegren has a secret regarding his birth.

hangle: 그는 내가 현재 있는 제국의 황자다.
first_translate: to put it simply, he’s actually the son of the emperor.
more specifically, he’s an illegitimate child whose existence hasn’t been made public yet.

hangle: 시그렌은 힘없는 평민 출신의 어머니에게서 태어났다.
first_translate: since his mother came from a family of powerless commoners,

hangle: 그를 눈엣가시처럼 여겨 죽이고 싶어 하는 자들은 많았다.
first_translate: there were many people who wanted to kill him off.

hangle: 시그렌은 어릴 적부터 늘 목숨을 위협받으며 살아왔다.
first_translate: siegren had always lived under constant threat since childhood.
029eventually, he ran away to hailon castle in the north.

hangle: 제국의 맨 끝이라 목숨을 노리는 자들의 영향력이 미치지 않았기 때문이다.
first_translate: this place was far enough from those trying to take his life.

hangle: 그 후 아벨이 시그렌이 가진 검의 재능을 알아보고,
first_translate: later on, abel discovered siegren’s talent with swords...
...and took him in as his apprentice.
that pretty much sums up siegren’s early life.

hangle: 본편에서도 여주인공에게 짧게 말해 준 게 끝이었다.
first_translate: in fact, even in the actual novel, only bits and pieces are revealed through conversations with the female protagonist.

hangle: 인물의 과거는 그저 성격을 나타내 줄 ‘설정’에 불과하니까.
first_translate: a character’s background serves merely as “settings” used to describe their personality traits.
on top of that, such settings aren’t uncommon in fantasy novels.
but still...

hangle: 이 모든 일을 이 애가 실제로 겪었다고 생각하니까….
first_translate: when I imagine how everything happened to someone real...
my heart goes out to him.
I feel terrible.
I’m planning to leave once the time comes,

hangle: 그래도 반성의 의미를 담아 여기 있을 동안은 얘한테 잘해줘야겠다.
first_translate: but until then, I want to treat him well while I can.

hangle: 게다가 시그렌은 나중에 날 죽일 예정이잖아?
first_translate: not to mention, siegren plans to kill me someday.

hangle: 혹시 모르니까 친하게 지낼 필요가 있어!
first_translate: I need to get along with him just in case!

hangle: 이 누나가 진짜 성심성의껏 돌볼 테니,
first_translate: I promise to look after you sincerely,
so please don’t forget when you grow older... no, spare my life instead.

hangle: 시그렌 신경 쓴다고 제대로 못 잤더니 너무 졸려…
first_translate: I didn’t sleep properly last night thinking about siegren... I'm exhausted...
I guess I’ll rest my eyes for a bit...

hangle: 뒷일은 시그렌이 정신을 차리면 생각해 보자….
first_translate: I’ll worry about what to do next when siegren wakes up...
yawn
how long have I slept?
huh?
where’s that gaze coming from--
oh.
he woke up!!
g-good morning!
nice meeting you!
wow.
seeing him clearly now, he does seem handsome.

hangle: 그런데 어려서 그런지 날 선 고양이 같아.
first_translate: at the same time though, he looks like a cat sharpening its claws due to being young.
thanks for helping me back there.
I thought he’d appear more laid-back considering he’s the main character.
wait... where am I?
you’re inside hailon castle.
who are you?
my name is fiona. and yours?
s-siegren.
why am I alive...?

hangle: 날 안고 구른 게 생각나지 않나?
first_translate: do you not remember rolling over together?

hangle: 무의식중에 사람을 돕다니, 과연 남자 주인공.
first_translate: helping others without realizing it himself... talk about your typical male protagonist.
I brought you here and asked the physician to heal you.
what?
yes, I know it sounds strange,

hangle: 난 네 몸 상태가 더 신경 쓰인단다.
first_translate: but I care more about your condition than anything else.
although he may be the male lead, he’s still just a boy.

hangle: 막연한 상상과 당장 눈앞의 현실의 차이는 엄청났다.
first_translate: there’s a huge difference between vague imagination and reality.

hangle: 시그렌이 다친 모습을 보니 죄책감이 장난이 아니다.
first_translate: looking at siegren injured fills me with guilt.

hangle: 난 왜 남주 과거를 불행하다고 설정해서….
first_translate: why did I make his past so tragic?!
